# port-labs Provider
[getport.io](https://getport.io)

## Example Usage
```terraform

terraform {
  required_providers {
    port-labs = {
      source = "port-labs/port-labs"
      version = "~> 0.10.0"
    }
  }
}

# Configure the port-labs Provider
provider "port-labs" {
  client_id = "my-client-id"
  secret    = "my-secret"
}

```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->

## Schema

### Required

- `client_id` (String)
- `secret` (String, Sensitive)

### Optional

- `base_url` (String)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
